FeInfo.cc

00001 #include "FeInfo.hh"
00002 #include <iostream>
00003 #include <iomanip>
00004 
00005 namespace CALICE {
00006   void FeInfo::print(  std::ostream& os) const {
00007     unsigned int fe_id=getFeID();
00008     BoardID board_id(getBoardID());
00009     os << board_id
00010        << std::setw(9) << ( (fe_id != static_cast<unsigned int>(getFifoFeID()) || fe_id != static_cast<unsigned int>(board_id.getBoardComponentNumber())) ? "corrupt" : "ok")
00011       //       << std::setw(2) << "fe from:: fifo:" <<  getFifoFeID()
00012       //       << std::setw(2) << " field:" <<  getFeID()
00013        << " label=" << std::setw(8) << getLabel()
00014        << " frame sync out=";
00015     os << std::hex;
00016     for (unsigned int word_i=0; word_i<5; word_i++) {
00017       os << std::setw(8) << getFrameSyncOut(word_i) << " ";
00018     }
00019     os << std::dec;
00020     os << " length=" << std::setw(8) << getFeLength()
00021        << " be.stat.=" << std::setw(8) << std::hex << getBeStatus() << std::dec
00022        << " fifo=" << std::setw(9) << (isFifoFull() ? (isFifoEmpty() ? "corrupt" : "full") : (isFifoEmpty() ? "empty " : ""))
00023        << getNumberOfFifoWords()
00024        << " trigger cnt=" << getTriggerCounter();
00025   }
00026 
00027 }
